header.title: Amalfi to Positano — Ferry
header.description: Follow these steps to travel from Amalfi to Positano by ferry. You’ll find tips on tickets, where to board in Amalfi, what to expect on arrival, and how to reach Hostel Brikette from the dock with as few stairs as possible.

overview.title: Journey overview
points: Frequent seasonal ferries link Amalfi and Positano with scenic coastal views.
Travelmar operates regular services; services may vary by season and weather.
Always check live schedules on the day of travel.

tickets.title: Tickets and schedules

intro.before: Check latest times and prices on

points: Buy tickets online in advance during peak months.
Arrive 15–20 minutes early for boarding queues.
Keep your ticket or QR code accessible for staff checks.

amalfiBoarding.title: Where to board in Amalfi
points: Most departures leave from Amalfi’s waterfront piers near Piazza Flavio Gioia.
Look for Travelmar desks and signage along the promenade.
Confirm the correct pier on your ticket; staff can direct you if unsure.

positanoArrival.title: Arriving in Positano
points: Boats arrive at Positano’s main dock on Spiaggia Grande.
With luggage, consider the porter service or Interno Positano bus to reduce stairs.
Walking uphill with heavy bags can be strenuous in summer heat.
